column2: tugged up the left sleeve of my pullover
column3: and checked my wristwatch. It was 4:17 a.m. This surprised me not because it was almost dawn

column1: 0417|4.17 am|He awoke at 4.17 am in a sweat. He had been dreaming of Africa again
column2: and then the dream had continued in the U.S. when he was a young man. But Inbata had been there
